record_type.description: Identifies the type of the resource.

default.description:
Indicates whether the SIM card group is the users default group.
The default group is created for the user and can not be removed.

name.description: A user friendly name for the SIM card group.

data_limit.description: Upper limit on the amount of data the SIM cards, within the group, can use.

sim_card_count.description: The number of SIM cards associated with the group.

private_wireless_gateway_id.description: The identification of the related Private Wireless Gateway resource.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date-time indicating when the resource was created.

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date-time indicating when the resource was updated.
